execution_quality: Agent executed the delegation strategy but targeted the wrong server (sandbox instead of skyhook), requiring correction. The approach of using the Task tool was appropriate for remote investigation, but misalignment on which server affected utility.
work_category: Administrative task delegation involving server maintenance (log cleanup) and package investigation (Forgejo). Agent was asked to check two separate items across infrastructure.
summary: The agent proactively delegated investigation tasks to remote agents, demonstrating autonomous initiative, but selected the wrong target server (sandbox vs skyhook). The error was caught and corrected by the user, requiring the work to be restarted. While the execution strategy was sound, the misalignment on server selection significantly impacted practical utility.
follow_up_pattern: User corrected the server target mid-session with 'whoops. I meant skyhook', indicating the work needed to be restarted on the correct system.
